text: Joe Émerson Bizera Bastos (born 17 May 1980 in Artigas) is a Uruguayan former football player, who last played for Liverpool Montevideo. ==Club career statistics== |- |1999||rowspan="8"|Peñarol||rowspan="8"|Primera División||7||0 |- |2000||23||3 |- |2001||32||3 |- |2002||26||3 |- |2003||28||2 |- |2004||4||0 |- |2005||0||0 |- |2005–06||0||0 |- |2005–06||rowspan="3"|Cagliari||rowspan="3"|Serie A||16||0 |- |2006–07||10||0 |- |2007–08||9||0 |- |2007–08||Maccabi Tel Aviv||Premier League||16||2 |- |2008–09||rowspan="2"|PAOK Thessaloniki||rowspan="2"|Super League||9||0 |- |2009–10||1||0 |- |2009–10||Albacete Balompié||Segunda División|||| 120||11 35||0 16||2 10||0 0||0 181||13 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2001||6||1 |- |2002||4||0 |- |2003||6||0 |- |2004||7||0 |- !Total||23||1 |} ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers
